H0.text: Migrate is the action that all plant and animal species must perform in order for each species to survive.

H1.text: Reproduce is something that all plant and animal species must do in order for each species to survive.

H2.text: All plant and animal species must make food in order for each species to survive.

H3.text: Change color is the action all plant and animal species must perform in order for each species to survive.

A4.text: When environmental factors are favorable, asexual reproduction is employed to exploit suitable conditions for survival such as an abundant food supply, adequate shelter, favorable climate, disease, optimum pH or a proper mix of other lifestyle requirements.

A5.text: The variations found in offspring of sexual reproduction allow some individuals to be better suited for survival and provide a mechanism for selective adaptation to occur.
